name: THIS LIFE FOR SALE
description:
WARNING: This game features flashing lights and visuals. Please do not play this game if you have any condition that make you sensitive to flashing lights and visuals.

Experience a day(s?) in the life of a worker team member in the far flung future of 3467 in this short Bitsy 3D narrative!  Let your life pass in the blink of an eye! Grapple with loneliness and exhaustion! Traverse ambiguous dreamscapes! Live in a society! Hustle! Grind! Earn!
